name: mistakenly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
wrongly or by mistake: She mistakenly believed that she could get away with not paying her taxes. He mistakenly said the city has a 31 percent unemployment rate. See
mistaken
More examplesFewer examplesHe mistakenly scheduled an interview for the same time as the game.My debit card was mistakenly charged twice for a large online order.You may mistakenly think that this movie is appropriate for young children.
